title.rendered: White Water Rafting Gift Certificates – AVA

content.rendered:
Do You Have Gift Certificates for Sale?

We sure do! A gift certificate from Arkansas Valley Adventures is a fantastic idea for the outdoor enthusiast in your life, and a great thing about gift certificates from AVA is they can be used for a variety of adventures. When you buy a gift certificate from Arkansas Valley Adventures, the lucky recipient can use it for whitewater rafting trips from the Buena Vista, Idaho Springs, Kremming, Breckenridge and Keystone offices. And the gift certificate can also be used for our exciting rock climbing excursions, zip line trips (now that’s fun!), lodging and even to buy items in our retail store. You can buy AVA gift certificates online, at any one of our locations, or can even call us and order over the phone. The gift certificates are sold in $50 increments, and when you purchase the gift certificates, you don’t have to know exactly which trip the certificate is for. The recipient must call AVA and make a reservation. Gift certificates are valid at any time during our season, and when you order, you will receive one email confirmation that shows your credit card charges, and a second email will be the actual gift certificate attached as a PDF file, which you can print or leave in electronic format. That’s all there is to it! There is nothing better than getting a gift certificate for the experience of a lifetime! Contact AVA today to get the water enthusiast in your life the best gift ever!
